name: tiny-evt
description: Vite powered foundation for building secure Electron Apps with TypeScript and Vue
author: Robocat<neatfx@gmail.com>

scripts.dev: cat scripts/args.esbuild.dev-runner | xargs esbuild && env-cmd -e dev node build/dev-runner.js
scripts.dist: cat scripts/args.esbuild.app-builder | xargs esbuild && env-cmd -e dist node build/app-builder.js
scripts.cypress: cat scripts/args.esbuild.dev-runner | xargs esbuild && env-cmd -e dev,cypress node build/dev-runner.js
scripts.spectron: cat scripts/args.esbuild.dev-runner | xargs esbuild && env-cmd -e dev,spectron node build/dev-runner.js
scripts.vtu: cat scripts/args.esbuild.dev-runner | xargs esbuild && env-cmd -e dev,vtu node build/dev-runner.js
